Install addtional softwares on AIX / VIOS ( sudo and rsync )

  • Login to NIM server pcdcunxaxap01.
  • If this is not during a system build, define the targethost variable
    export targethost=<host_name>

sudo

  • Copy the latest sudo RPM from the NIM server ( pcdcunxaxap01) to the server where we need it installed
    sudo scp /prod/images/rpms/sudo-1.6.9p23-2noldap.aix5.3.ppc.rpm ${targethost}:/tmp
  • Install / Upgrade sudo on the target host
    sudo ssh ${targethost} "rpm -Uvh /tmp/sudo-1.6.9p23-2noldap.aix5.3.ppc.rpm"
  • Only copy on NEW BUILD ONLY
  • Copy the latest sudoers file to the target server.<code>sudo scp /prod/images/etc/sudoers ${targethost}:/etc/sudoers</code>

rsync

  • Copy the latest RPM from the NIM server ( pcdcunxaxap01) to the server where we need it installed
    sudo scp /prod/images/rpms/rsync-3.0.6-1.aix5.3.ppc.rpm ${targethost}:/tmp
  • Install / Upgrade rsync on the target host
    sudo ssh ${targethost} "rpm -Uvh /tmp/rsync-3.0.6-1.aix5.3.ppc.rpm"

bash

  • Copy the latest RPM from the NIM server ( pcdcunxaxap01) to the server where we need it installed
    sudo scp /prod/images/rpms/bash-4.2-3.aix6.1.ppc.rpm ${targethost}:/tmp
  • Install / Upgrade bash on the target host
    sudo ssh ${targethost} "rpm -Uvh /tmp/bash-4.2-3.aix6.1.ppc.rpm"
  • Add /usr/bin/bash to /etc/security/login.cfg
    sudo ssh ${targethost} "chsec -f /etc/security/login.cfg -s usw -a shells=/bin/sh,/bin/bsh,/bin/csh,/bin/ksh,/bin/tsh,/usr/bin/sh,/usr/bin/bsh,/usr/bin/csh,/usr/bin/ksh,/usr/bin/tsh,/usr/sbin/sliplogin,/usr/sbin/uucp/uucico,/usr/sbin/snappd,/usr/bin/rksh,/usr/bin/rksh93,/usr/bin/bash"
